channel.title: CVE Feed for Typps -- Calendarista Basic Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Typps -- Calendarista Basic Edition

item.title: CVE-2024-27993|2024-03-21T15:05:57.388Z -- Typps -- Calendarista Basic Edition
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Typps Calendarista Basic Edition.This issue affects Calendarista Basic Edition: from n/a through 3.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-31942|2024-04-15T09:10:59.100Z -- Typps -- Calendarista Basic Edition
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Typps Calendarista Basic Edition.This issue affects Calendarista Basic Edition: from n/a through 3.0.2.
